item.title: Mary Wells - My Guy
item.description:
Nothing you can say
can tear me away
From my guy
nothing you could do
‘Cause I’m stuck
like glue to my guy
I’m sticking to my guy
like a stamp
To a letter
like birds
To there feathers
we stick together
I’m telling you
from the start
I can’t be torn apart
from my guy
Nothing you could do
could make me
Be untrue to my guy
(my guy)
Nothing you could buy
could make me
Tell a lie to my guy
I gave my guy
My word of honor
to be faithful
And I’m gonna
you’d best
Be believing
I won’t be
Deceiving my guy
as a matter of opinion
I think he’s tops
my opinion is
He’s cream of the crop
as a matter of
Taste to be exact
he’s my ideal
As a matter of fact
no muscle bound man
Could take my hand
from my guy
(My guy)
no handsome face
Could ever take
the place of my guy
He may not be
a movie star
But when it comes to
being happy we are
There’s not a man
today
Who can take me away
from my guy-

No muscle bound man
could take my hand
From my guy (my guy)
no handsome face
Could ever take
the place of my guy
He may not be
a movie star
But when it comes to
being happy we are
There’s not a man
today
Who can take me away
from my guy
(What’cha say?)
there’s
Not a man today
who could take me away
From my guy
(tell me more!)
There’s not a man
today
Who could take me away
from my guy
There’s not a man
today
Who could take me away
from my guy-
